thread.title: Apple posts sales increase of 38 percent in Q3
thread.title_full: Apple posts sales increase of 38 percent in Q3 | MENAFN.COM

title: Apple posts sales increase of 38 percent in Q3
text:
(MENAFN) US tech giant Apple announced posting earnings surge in the third quarter, with profits increasing 38 percent driven by strong sales of iPhone 6, Xinhua reported.

Meanwhile, revenues for the company increased to USD49.61 billion compared to the same period a year earlier with major growth coming from the Chinese market.

However, with IPhone sales coming in below expectations at around 47.5 million for the last three months, Apple shares took a dive shortly after earnings were announced.

"Apple now contributes to about 20 percent to the total of the S&P 500 market cap, the total weighting of the S&P 500 so Apple's results are extremely important," senior equity analyst at S&P said.
